Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Ate usa nu rata nu vi sijada karo ate rata de lame hise vica vi usa di sifata salaha karo
Iha loka jaladi milana vali ciza cahude hana ate inham ne apane piche ika bhari dina nu chada rakhi'a hai
Asim hi unham nu paida kita ate asim hi unham de dhance nu paka kita ate jadom asim cahange tam unham de badale unham varage hora loka lai avange
Iha ika upadesa hai tam jihara bada cahe apane raba vala (jana vala) raha apana lave
Ate tusim nahim caha sakade paratu iha ki jihara alaha nu manazura hove. Besaka alaha janana vala ate bibeka vala hai
Uha jisa nu cahuda hai apani rahimata vica dakhila dida hai ate usa ne ati'acari'am la'i dukhada'ika saza ti'ara kara rakhi hai
Unham havavam di sahu jihari chada diti'am jandi'am hana
Phira uha tuphani raphatara nala caladi'am hana
Ate badalam nu cuka ke phaila'undi'am hana
Phira mamali'am nu alaga karadi'am hana
Phira farasiti'am di saunha jihare vahi li'a'unde hana
Bahane de rupa vica jam darave de rupa vica
Jihara va'ada tuhade nala kita ja riha hai, uha zarura vaparana vala hai
So jadom tare madhama pai janage
Ate jadom asamana pata javega
Ate jadom pahara zura-zura kara dite janage
Ate jadom niradharita samem te paigabara ikathe kite janage
Kisa dina la'i mauka dita gi'a
Faisale de dina la'i
Ate tuhanu ki pata ki phaisale da dina ki hai
Usa dina nu jhuthala'una vali'am la'i vinasa hai
Ki asim pichali'am nu nasata nahim kita
Phira asim unham de piche, pichali'am nu bhejade ham
Asim aparadhi'am de nala ajiha hi karade ham
Usa dina nu jhuthala'una vali'am la'i vinasa hai
